STARTPAGE.TEXT: This website is intended to be a web application for reading and searching the texts of the Bonner Kant-Korpus. It is currently under development.

NOT-FOUND.TEXT: The requested page does not exist.

BUTTON.LABEL: Search
BUTTON.TOOLTIP: You must enter at least one search term and select at least one work

INCLUDE_FOOTNOTES.LABEL: Include footnotes
INCLUDE_FOOTNOTES.TOOLTIP: Footnotes are searched and included in the results if the switch is on.

INCLUDE_HEADINGS.LABEL: Include headings
INCLUDE_HEADINGS.TOOLTIP: Headings are searched and included in the results if the switch is on.

INCLUDE_SUMMARIES.LABEL: Include summaries
INCLUDE_SUMMARIES.TOOLTIP: Paragraph summaries are searched and included in the results if the switch is on.

SEARCH_TIPS.TEXT: Use special characters for specialized searches: & for AND, | for OR, ! for NOT, (...) to group terms, and "..." for exact phrases. Example: (dog | "white mice") & !cat
